originalSystemId.description: In the case of data from an aggregator,the unique identifier from the original data set.Used in cases where two aggregators may encounter the same data.

accuracy.description: Accuracy of GPS location in meters

severityRangeScale.description: Severity scale on an range level

sampleSource.description: Source of the sample i.e Field, greenhouse, lab

genbankAccessionNumber.description: GeneBank number for identification and confirmation

pestIdentificationMethod.description: This can contain multiple identification methods (PCR,ELISA)

visitType.description: Purpose of visit to area for collected data

projectName.description: Name of the project as the source of data

pestVerificationMethod.description: This can contain multiple verification methods

hasVisualSymptoms.description: Specimens portrayed visual symptoms related to the pest

contributingSystemId.description: Unique identifier from system contributing data for followup and updating

pestIncidence.description: Number of measure for disease occurrence on subject population

sampleDesc.description: Description of the sample i.e roots, leaves

pestRecordBasis.description: The basis of the occurrence (Human observation)

severityNumberScale.description: Severity scale on an number level (5)

severityPercentageScale.description: Severity scale on an percentage level

geodeticDatum.description: North America Datum or World geodetic coordinate system

approximateQuantity.description: Approximate or range of subjects observed or biocontrol agents released (15, 15-20)

dateRecorded.description: Date when it was recorded into the system

sampleUnits.description: Unit of measure (individuals, adults, grams, etc.)
